publisher.publisher-name: The Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, L. Eötvös University

title-group.article-title: Terrestrial snail assemblages in the Bükk Mountains

permissions.copyright-statement: © Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, ELTE

abstract.p: The paper analyzes the snail assemblages of 36 plant community types in the Bükk Mts, Hungary. The abiotic and biotic factors influencing spatial distribution along vegetational succession, and structural changes of assemblages during reforestation are examined. Different anthropogenic effects are detected. Differences between species composition of the various beechwoods of Europe are evaluated based on new and literature data.
